nodes.text: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace (junior novelization)

Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace is a Legends junior novel written by Patricia C. Wrede, based on a screenplay and story by George Lucas. It adapts the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, and it was first published on May 3, 1999 by Scholastic, shortly before the film's release. The novel was collected in Star Wars: Collector's Edition (2005), Star Wars Boxed Set: Episodes I–VI (2007), and Star Wars: Prequel Trilogy (2014).
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…
A world is threatened. A young queen must save her people. A dark evil rises again. A young Jedi is discovered.
